metadata.title: CVE-2012-4508 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Race condition in fs/ext4/extents.c in the Linux kernel before 3.4.16allows local users to obtain sensitive information from a deleted file byreading an extent that was not properly marked as uninitialized.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4508` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
